title: Hindu & CB HOF, Piedmont 42, tough P350, hand-cut Matty portrait for sale
author: Luke

posts.post_title: Hindu & CB HOF, Piedmont 42, tough P350, hand-cut Matty portrait for sale
posts.post_content:
Need to replenish my Paypal account with some $, so I'm offering some up some tough cards.  Most of these have been buried in my collection for awhile.  Thanks for taking a look.

Free shipping within the US
